# Drag-n-Drop-File-Upload
Java HTML CSS JavaScript PHP Drag and Drop File Upload Template DB Code Included

### Features

1. Clean Code.
2. Drag and Drop Support with Click to Upload Support.
3. Auto Submission.
4. DB Code Included.
5. No Extremal CSS (like: Bootstrap) Required.
